page.title: 02MANOR FARM
page.content: Manor Farm { ************} Manor Farm is a pig farm{200}acres in size. They have{7}boars and{173}sows. On average there are{80}piglets born a week. Altogether there are{1,000} pigs. They have been breeding for {3}years and there are{3}breeds:Large white, Land race and a cross breed. The pigs are sold at a price of{Â£28}to a farm in Yorkshire to be fattened up. They also have some crops wheat, barley and oil seed rape. Apart from the manager,they have two tractor drivers and two "pig men".The owners also have a{300}acre farm in Epperstone. { The vet comes every{3}months. {:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: {::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
